onChange.script:
if currentValue.value:
		system.perspective.print('Volunteer Data Reset')
		volunteerData = self.custom.selectionData
		if len(volunteerData) > 0:
			#Data is selected, set row data to selection data
			if volunteerData[0].active:
				active = 1
			else:
				active = 0
			self.custom.rowData = {
				"volunteerId":volunteerData[0].volunteerId,
				"humanId":volunteerData[0].humanId,
				"breezeId":volunteerData[0].humanBreezeId,
				"breezeIdV":volunteerData[0].volunteerBreezeId,
				"providerId":volunteerData[0].providerId,
				"providerTypeId":volunteerData[0].providerTypeId,
				"congregationId":volunteerData[0].congregationId,
				"genderId":volunteerData[0].genderId,
				"active":active,
				"firstName":volunteerData[0].firstName,
				"middleName":volunteerData[0].middleName,
				"lastName":volunteerData[0].lastName,
				"suffix":volunteerData[0].suffix,
				"nickName":volunteerData[0].nickName,
				"dob":volunteerData[0].dob,
				"gender":volunteerData[0].genderName,
				"email":volunteerData[0].email,
				"providerName":volunteerData[0].providerName,
				"providerTypeName":volunteerData[0].providerTypeName
				}
		else:
			#no Data selected, set to defaults
			self.custom.rowData = {
				"volunteerId":-1,
				"humanId":-1,
				"breezeId":-1,
				"breezeIdV":-1,
				"providerId":-1,
				"providerTypeId":-1,
				"congregationId":-1,
				"genderId":-1,
				"active":-1,
				"firstName":'',
				"middleName":'',
				"lastName":'',
				"suffix":'',
				"nickName":'',
				"dob":'',
				"gender":'',
				"email":'',
				"providerName":'',
				"providerTypeName":''
				}
	
	self.custom.reset = False
